summary: A new warhammer made with clutter and a iron warhammer from vanilla Skyrim, this weapon can be forged under the iron category with the correct ingredients.
descriptionHtml: A new warhammer made with clutter and a iron warhammer from vanilla Skyrim, this weapon can be forged under the iron category with the correct ingredients, you can also find it in the Jorrvaskr basement.  I made it after reading a thread on the skyrim nexus requesting a new warhammer.  The post asked for a short quest in which I am planning to make. Forum: http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/1286365-two-awesome-weapons-preferably-obtained-through-quests/
author: MJAB98
